title: 87/134/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 January 1987 amending Decision 86/269/EEC concerning the establishments in Canada for which Member States may authorize the importation of fresh meat
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 30 January 1987
amending Decision 86/269/EEC concerning the establishments in Canada for which Member States may authorize the importation of fresh meat
(87/134/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The date of '31 January 1987' in Article 1 of Decision 86/269/EEC is hereby replaced by '29 April 1987'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 January 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
